Container.Name: Webmail-Lite-PHP
Container.Overview:
DESCRIPTION Fast and easy-to-use webmail front-end for your existing IMAP mail server, Plesk or cPanel.
Here you can check a demo version: https://lite.afterlogic.com/
NOTES • On first launch, go to 'ip_host:port/adminpanel' and enter the default credentials: superadmin/-empty- (user/pass). Here you will have to configure all the required things to start working with your mail provider(s). • There's no need to configure an external DB service (integrated), but you can: MySQL/MariaDB.
VERSION v1.0 (2021-12-02)
